alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County Mountains excluding the Santa Monica Range; Ventura County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 13 at 1:12AM PST until December 14 at 8:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 PM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 feet iabove 7000 feet. Winds could gust as high as 65 mph. * WHERE...Ventura County Mountains and Los Angeles County Mountains excluding the Santa Monica Range. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 8 PM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Very strong winds could cause extensive tree damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snowfall rates will occur Tuesday morning. Light snow accumulations are possible on the Grapevine portion of Interstate 5 Tuesday evening.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions from CalTrans are available by calling 1 800 4 2 7 7 6 2 3.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County Mountains excluding the Santa Monica Range; Ventura County Mountains
